sentences.english: In recent year, it is found that the part etiology of ophthalmopathy is associated with toxoplasmosis infection.

sentences.english: Conclusion ROP is the leading cause of blindness of students in Guangzhou Blind School.

sentences.english: Everybody's hep red-eyed disease is among them one of.

sentences.english: Experts advise the residents of the city to pay attention to personal hygiene to prevent the disease.

sentences.english: Recently, "pink-eye disease" is spreading in many places across the country.
sentences.chinese: 最近一段时间，全国多地红眼病发病出现上升势头。

sentences.english: The occurance regularity of tobacco frogeye leaf spot (Cercospora Nicotzanae) and control methods were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了烟草蛙眼病发病规律和防治方法。

sentences.english: The above ophthalmopathy mainly aims at the full-term baby.

sentences.english: The pink eye is going around again this summer .

sentences.english: But information on its specific associations with poverty is limited.

sentences.english: Objective To study an epidemiological survey of eye disease and blindness in Rongcheng city.
sentences.chinese: 目的对荣成市进行眼病及盲目的流行病学调查。

sentences.english: That means that this is no longer simple myopia, but a diseased eye.

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
